resources.string: All the data for this application was retrieved from Region of Waterloo\'s open data portal. Please contact them at 519-575-4400 ext. 5147 (Monday to Friday, 8:30 a.m. - 4:30 p.m.). You can also direct emails to publichealth@regionofwaterloo.ca
Information on this app is provided solely for the user\'s information and it is provided without warranty, guarantee, or responsibility of any kind, either expressed or implied.
The source code for this application is availiable at https://github.com/guoarthur/SafeToEat .
